title: Art Institute of Chicago Reads: Book Club Brunch Celebrating "Cauleen Smith: Human_3.0 Reading List"
hero_caption: <p>Cauleen Smith. <em>Flyboy in the Buttermilk, from Human_3.0 Reading List</em>,&nbsp;2016. Promised gift of Helen and Sam Zell.</p>
short_description: Hosted by the Leadership Advisory Committee
list_description: Hosted by the Leadership Advisory Committee
description:
In celebration of Cauleen Smith's Human_3.0 Reading List, join Smith for a soulful brunch and discussion on Greg Tate’s Flyboy in the Buttermilk: Essays on Contemporary America.

Attendees are encouraged to read Tate's collection of essays ahead of the event and be prepared to engage with other guests.
